title: The People's Almanac #2
description: This informative 1,416 page book by David Wallechinsky and Irving Wallace is a second issuance regarding little known facts. This book is not a revision of the previous People's Almanac but a brand new book containing over one million new words. Its contents equal ten-normal sized books. It searches behind the facts to offer inside information as well as constant entertainment.
author: David Wallechinsky
